qas.question: How many deaths were reported only in the Sichuan province?
How many people were listed as missing?
How many earthquake relief workers were killed?
What is the total tally of known deaths caused by the earthquake?
What is the number of missing persons?
What were the 158 relief workers doing when they were killed?

context: According to Chinese state officials, the quake caused <a0_0><a6_0>69,180<a6_0/><a0_0/> known deaths including <a1_0><a5_0>68,636<a5_0/><a1_0/> in Sichuan province; <a2_0><a7_0>18,498<a7_0/><a2_0/> people are listed as missing, and <a3_0><a8_0>374,176<a8_0/><a3_0/> injured, but these figures may further increase as more reports come in.[dated info] This estimate includes <a4_0>158<a4_0/> earthquake relief workers who were killed in landslides as they <a9_0>tried to repair roads<a9_0/>.
